casebody.data:
Myron LEWIS ; and Myron Lewis, as Special Administrator of the Estate of Sheila Lewis, Appellants,
v.
RENOWN REGIONAL MEDICAL CENTER, a Nevada Corporation, d/b/a Renown Regional Medical Center; and Renown Health, a Nevada Corporation, d/b/a Renown Health, Respondents. No. 74300 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED DECEMBER 18, 2018

AFFIRMED.
